sources.name: DeptLKP
sources.script:
source(output(
		ACCT_ID as string,
		{ ACCT_TYP} as string,
		ACCT_DESC as string,
		CASH as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DeptLKP

sources.name: EMP
sources.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		Prop_1 as string,
		Prop_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> EMP

sinks.name: Tgt1
sinks.script:
FILTRANS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Tgt1

transformations.name: JNRTRANS
transformations.script:
DeptLKP, EMP join(DeptLKP@Deptno == EMP@deptno,
	joinType:'',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JNRTRANS

transformations.name: AGGTRANS
transformations.script:
EXPTRANS aggregate(groupBy(empno = empno,
		Upper_ename,
		deptno = EMP@deptno,
		comm = comm,
		deptname = deptname,
		Loc = Loc),
	max_sal = max(sal)) ~> AGGTRANS
